item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out.; INC#0371; 07:19AM; 5519 S Ruthelen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TGxxQx; #ChesterfieldSquare; 31 Firefighters took just 23 minutes (7:42 AM) to access, confine and extinguish stubborn flames in the walls surrounding the chimney of a 1,200 square foot two-story residential duplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E266 E34 E46 E57 RA266 RA866 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out 03/31/2024 INC#0081

item.description: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0081; 01:25AM; 911 S Malcolm Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VCSuP2; #Westwood; First arriving 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 31 minutes (1:56 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in the attic and second floor of a 3,795 square foot two-story home (built 1927). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC18 BC5 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E227 E237 E263 E269 E292 E37 E58 E59 E71 E88 E95 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA37 RA827 RA837 SO1 SQ95 T27 T37 T63 T69 T92 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey
item.category: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out

item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0819; 01:32PM; 6622 S 5th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TX1bCF; Hyde Park; LAFD responded to a one-story home with smoke showing. Flames consumed multiple rooms inside. Crews established hose lines, made entry, and initiated fire attack. The first 22 firefighters took just 14 minutes to contain the fire to extinguish the flames (1:46pm). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E233 E266 E33 E57 RA257 RA846 SQ21 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0131; 02:49AM; 3947 S Mclaughlin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vyA8nM; #MarVista; Firefighters found a one-story single-family home engulfed in flames. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines to attack the fire inside and protect the nearby threatened buildings, while others ascended ladders to perform ventilation on the rooftop (to allow smoke and super-heated gases to escape and make it more survivable for fire crews below). It took 35 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E263 E292 E43 E62 E63 EM9 RA43 RA62 RA862 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0131; 02:23AM; 3947 S Mclaughlin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vyA8nM; #MarVista; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E263 E292 E43 E62 E63 EM9 RA43 RA62 RA862 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1186; 04:57PM; 1310 N Detroit St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TFYl3B; #Hollywood; Los Angeles City and County firefighters responded to a four-story residential building with smoke showing from the rear. Crews made access to the smoke-filled building, instructing residents to shelter inside of their apartment units. Firefighters located one unit on the third floor with contents burning inside, causing the heavy smoke conditions throughout the building. It took the first 50 LAFD firefighters (along with help from LACoFD) 36 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. Thankfully, firefighter communications with residents (telling them to stay in their units without opening the door to the smoky conditions) kept the many building occupants safe. There were no reported injuries despite the building being heavily occupied. One man later came home from the store to find his apartment destroyed. Red Cross is responding to assist him during this time of being displaced by the fire. The cause is under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC14 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E278 E288 E3 E35 E41 E60 E61 E82 E95 E97 EM1 EM13 EM14 HR3 PI3 RA15 RA41 RA82 RA827 SO1 SQ95 T27 T29 T35 T61 T78 T88 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Update Auto Rollover; INC#1108; 05:00PM; 3524 W 39th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43B3HS4; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; LAFD firefighters and paramedics responded to a multi-vehicle collision involving an MTA bus (no entrapment). At least 14 people were assessed by firefighters and/or paramedics, including occupants of the bus and occupants of other vehicles involved. Three were transported in moderate condition, and six were transported in fair condition (unknown ages/genders). The rest declined ambulance transport to an area hospital, after being assessed on scene. LAPD Inc #3063. Nothing further.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E226 E26 E34 EM11 EM5 EM9 RA246 RA26 RA266 RA46 RA806 RA809 RA811 RA814 RA862 RA866 T26; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1186; 04:21PM; 1310 N Detroit St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TFYl3B; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Four-story apartment building with moderate smoke showing from the rear. Offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC9 E227 E41 E61 E82 RA41 RA827 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover; INC#1108; 03:40PM; 3524 W 39th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43B3HS4; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; LAFD is on scene of a multi-vehicle collision, with rollover, that included an MTA bus with passengers. LAFD is assessing at least 8 patients on scene, and preparing transport for those who would like further care at the hospital. LAPD Inc #3063.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E226 E26 E34 EM11 EM5 EM9 RA26 RA266 RA46 RA806 RA809 RA811 RA862 RA866 T26; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0522; 10:18AM; 229 E 66th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4acDn3m; #Florence; The first 26 LAFD firefighters extinguished the one-story duplex attic fire in 26 minutes, protecting the living quarters below with a coordinated effort of inside salvage work (move/cover belongings to protect from water damage), rooftop ventilation, and interior fire attack. There were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 BC18 E21 E221 E233 E33 E57 RA33 RA857 SO1 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
